name: Goblin
description: A small, wiry creature with green skin, sharp teeth, and a mischievous grin. More cunning than brave, and more annoying than deadlyâ€”unless you turn your back.

name: Hobgoblin
description: A disciplined, militaristic goblinoid known for cunning tactics and strict hierarchy. Often leads goblin raiding parties.

name: Orc
description: A hulking brute with jagged armor and a thirst for blood. Not known for brains, but definitely for breaking bones.

name: Bugbear
description: A large and brutish goblinoid that stalks its prey in the shadows. Bugbears rely on surprise and sheer strength to overwhelm foes.

name: Gnoll
description: A savage hyena-like humanoid, feared for its bloodlust and pack hunting. Gnolls are relentless and cruel predators.

name: Kobold
description: A small, reptilian humanoid, often found in tunnels and mines. Kobolds are cunning, crafty, and numerous, but individually weak.

name: Skeleton
description: A rattling undead warrior held together by dark magic. Empty eye sockets glow with malevolent light.

name: Zombie
description: A slow, shambling corpse risen by dark magic. Driven by hunger for living flesh, it is relentless and terrifying in groups.

name: Knight
description: A heavily armored warrior sworn to uphold honor and defend the realm. Moves slower but strikes with devastating force.

name: Mage
description: A spellcaster wearing light robes, relying on magic rather than physical defenses. Vulnerable up close, dangerous at a distance.

name: Gnome Wizard
description: A tiny, clever spellcaster with a fondness for illusions and elemental magic. Often underestimated until the first spell hits.

name: Human Bandit
description: A greedy rogue who preys on travelers. Quick and cunning, but weak in single combat without ambush or numbers.

name: Human Warrior
description: A trained fighter with a shield and sword. They patrol roads or serve local lords, often organized but not particularly cunning.

name: Elf Archer
description: A lithe and graceful humanoid with exceptional marksmanship. Masters of the bow, elves often fight from the shadows or treetops.

name: Dwarf Warrior
description: A sturdy and resilient fighter, often armored head to toe. Dwarves are known for their courage in battle and loyalty to allies.

name: Dark Elf
description: A cunning and dangerous elf from the shadows. Known for poisons, traps, and dark magic, they rarely fight fair.

name: Half-Orc
description: A hulking mix of human and orc, fierce and strong. Often feared for their strength and savagery in battle.

name: ManBearPig
description: A terrifying hybrid of half man, half bear and half pig! Extremely strong and fast, capable of crushing enemies with brute force and tusks. A rare and dangerous creature.
